Package io.dimeformat

package io.dimeformat
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Base58
    Encodes and decodes byte arrays and strings to and from base 58.
    Data
    DiME item that carries a data payload.
    Dime
    Central class that handles a few important settings and constants.
    Envelope
    An encapsulating object that can carry one or more DiME items.
    Identity
    Represents an entity inside a network, or equivalent system.
    IdentityIssuingRequest
    Class used to create a request for the issuing of an identity to an entity.
    Item
    Base class for any other type of Di:ME items that can be included inside an Envelope instance.
    ItemLink
    Represents a link to a Dime item.
    ItemTest
     
    Key
    Represents cryptographic keys.
    Message
    A class that can be used to create secure and integrity protected messages, that can be sent to entities, who may verify the integrity and trust of the message.
    Signature
    Encapsulates a digital signature.
    SignatureTest
     
    Tag
    A Dime item that uses item links to cryptographically connect itself to other items.
    Utility
    Utility support methods.
